bug.short_desc: Add support for multi value parameter

long_desc.thetext:
The current handling of multiple arguments is not really useable and could be improved. The new idea thought out by Andreas and me declares multi argument supporting functions this way:
* @param childs {qx.html.Element...} elements to insert
This mean that you can call this function with one or multiple elements. The major improvement of this is that the parameter can define the type of the additional parameters. Also it is possible to have a parameter of a type supporting multiple args and another one not supporting this.
Example: * @param childs {qx.html.Element...|String} elements to insert or XPATH expression
The presentation in the API viewer should be comparable and also use these ellipsis symbol.
